author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Unilever Says ‍Ann Fudge Will Be Retiring At Conclusion Of 2018 AGMs
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Unilever Plc:
* ANN FUDGE WILL BE RETIRING FROM UNILEVER N.V. AND PLC BOARDS AT CONCLUSION OF 2018 AGMS HAVING SERVED FOR NINE YEARS ON BOARDS​
* ‍PROPOSED ANDREA JUNG JOIN BOARDS AS NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
